name: Bracara Augusta: Shadow of the Past
name_original: Bracara Augusta: Shadow of the Past
description:
Escape Braga's altered Roman ruins and retrieve Isis's artefact

     After working the entire day at the cafe, “Frigideiras do Cantinho” it is time to close the café. When you see a weird man, idling above the ruins, you ask him to leave. He then pulls a weird artefact that creates an earthquake, the glass above the ruins is shattered, and both of you fall in the underground ruins. When you wake up the café is no longer there and you stuck in the ruins. Now you must find a way out.

  European Culture

Explore the Portuguese Roman Ruins of Bracara August

   Don’t travel alone

Roam the ruins with your helping companion Adriana

   Archaeological pieces.

Find all of the collectibles

Solve the Roman themed puzzles to unlock the exit
